channel.title: Server is off help?
channel.description: hey i was trying to unip somone i went to "bannedhosts" and found the ip i wanted to unip, there was 2 of the same one so i deleted both of them and compiled and ran the server but now when i run the server it says starting on port 43594 like usual and everything else is the same but now when ppl try to logg... on they cant.. and it says their ip like multiple times trying to logg on i DONT KNOW WHAT i did can any one please help!

item.title: Server is off help?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“Junes, post:3, topic:363977”][quote author=Jddogg9 link=topic=460217.msg3367001#msg3367001 date=1286857258]
When editing text files you don’t need to restart the server.

When editing .cfg files, you don’t need to compile the server.
[/quote]

.cfg files yes you do lol[/quote]

Are you mentally retarded?

Compiling JAVA scripts are only the .java files.

@echo off
java *.java
pause

Simple compiler for non-packaged sources. Do you think that will compile the .cfg files?

No. Why? Because .cfg files aren’t compiled. Nice try though.

Read full topic
